<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/tensorspec-h">llvm/Analysis/TensorSpec.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/include/llvm/analysis/utils/traininglogger-h">llvm/Analysis/Utils/TrainingLogger.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &lt;system&#95;error&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">namespace </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm">llvm</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// A MLModelRunner that asks for advice from an external agent, or host. It</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// uses 2 files - ideally named pipes - one to send data to that agent, and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// one to receive advice.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The data exchange uses the training logger (Utils/TrainingLogger.h) format.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Specifically, the compiler will send the log header, set the context, and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// send observations; the host is expected to reply with a tensor value after</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// each observation as a binary buffer that&#39;s conforming to the shape of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// advice. Interleaved, the data closely resembles the training log for a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// log where we don&#39;t capture the reward signal.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Note that the correctness of the received data is the responsibility of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// host. In particular, if insufficient data were sent, the compiler will block</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// when waiting for an advice.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Note that the host can either open the pipes RW, or open first the pipe to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// the compiler - i.e. the &quot;Inbound&quot; - and then the &quot;Outbound&quot;, to avoid</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// deadlock. This is because the compiler first tries to open the inbound</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// (which will hang until there&#39;s a writer on the other end).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/interactivemodelrunner"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/interactivemodelrunner/#a82ed5b95e51fbe7344411033a06329be">InteractiveModelRunner</a> : </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mlmodelrunner/#ad3a2236255bf0a1c90006508a28a21fd">MLModelRunner</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/interactivemodelrunner/#a82ed5b95e51fbe7344411033a06329be">InteractiveModelRunner</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/llvmcontext">LLVMContext</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mlmodelrunner/#afa197695caf1d92f3efeddd1156d9cde">Ctx</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><span class="doxyHighlight">                         </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::vector&lt;TensorSpec&gt; &amp;Inputs,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><span class="doxyHighlight">                         </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/tensorspec">TensorSpec</a> &amp;Advice, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> OutboundName,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><span class="doxyHighlight">                         <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> InboundName);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> R-&gt;getKind() == <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mlmodelrunner/#a81819d92a6045c9191f144ca86044b35a24b9b8c0634a40138e76b2fb86894698">MLModelRunner::Kind::Interactive</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/interactivemodelrunner/#acd24bb7114ceab6169ea9569b8037370"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/interactivemodelrunner/#acd24bb7114ceab6169ea9569b8037370">switchContext</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Name)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> override </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Log-&gt;switchContext(Name);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Log-&gt;flush();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"></CodeLine>
